newsItems.title: Mapping the Decentralized Storage Ecosystem
newsItems.description: What truly defines a storage system as decentralized, beyond data distribution, is the underlying principle that the computers hosting the data are controlled by different entities and that no single entity exercises full control.

newsItems.title: A Year in Review: Celebrating the impact of our Decentralized Archivist Communities
newsItems.description: This Human Rights Day, OpenArchive is highlighting the important work our Decentralized Archivist Communities do to fight for a more just world for at-risk groups. They work to combat electoral violence, threats to the environment, gender-based violence, arbitrary detention, and many other pressing issues.

newsItems.title: Memo desde Ciudad de México:  Examinando las necesidades de las comunidades de documentalistas trabajando en México
newsItems.description: Quienes defienden los derechos humanos en México enfrentan amenazas crecientes al documentar abusos a los derechos humanos en el país. Nuestra reciente evaluación de necesidades con Data Cívica brinda información sobre las realidades, desafíos y oportunidades que enfrentan activistas, periodistas y testigos en México al documentar y archivar evidencia de violencia e injusticia.

newsItems.title: Memo from Mexico City: Examining the needs of documenter communities working in Mexico
newsItems.description: Mexican human rights defenders face increasing threats for documenting human rights abuses in the country. Our recent needs assessment with Data Cívica offers insight into the realities, challenges, and opportunities faced by activists, journalists, and eyewitnesses in Mexico while documenting and archiving evidence of violence and injustice.

newsItems.title: Memo desde Havana: Examinando las necesidades de las comunidades de documentalistas trabajando en Cuba
newsItems.description: Quienes defienden los derechos humanos en Cuba enfrentan amenazas crecientes por documentar la represión y violencia del gobierno. Nuestra reciente evaluación de necesidades con Cubalex ofrece una perspectiva de las realidades, desafíos y oportunidades que las personas defensoras de derechos humanos enfrentan en el contexto cubano al documentar y archivar evidencias de injusticias.

newsItems.title: Memo from Havana: Examining the needs of documenter communities working in Cuba
newsItems.description: Cuban human rights defenders face increasing threats for documenting government repression and violence. Our recent needs assessment with Cubalex offers insight into the realities, challenges, and opportunities that human rights defenders in the Cuban context face while documenting and archiving evidence of injustice.

newsItems.title: Preserving the Past, Protecting the Future: The Vital Role of Encryption in Media Preservation
newsItems.description: Human rights archivists rely on encryption to protect at-risk communities, safeguard sensitive media, maintain data integrity, control access, and facilitate secure storage and transfer.

newsItems.title: Memo desde Quito: Entendiendo las necesidades de las comunidades documentadoras de Ecuador
newsItems.description: Las personas defensoras de los derechos humanos en Ecuador enfrentan crecientes amenazas por su trabajo en la lucha contra los abusos de las operaciones mineras. Nuestra reciente evaluación de necesidades con la Asociación Latinoamericana para el Desarrollo Alternativo (ALDEA) ofrece información sobre las realidades, desafíos y oportunidades que enfrentan estos defensores de derechos humanos en Ecuador mientras documentan y archivan evidencia de injusticia.

newsItems.title: Memo from Quito: Understanding the Needs of Ecuador’s Documenter Communities
newsItems.description: Ecuadorian human rights defenders face increasing threats for their work combatting abuses by mining operations. Our recent needs assessment with the Latin American Association for Alternative Development (ALDEA) offers insight into the realities, challenges, and opportunities that these human rights defenders in Ecuador face while documenting and archiving evidence of injustice.

newsItems.title: OTF & Trail of Bits’ Independent Security Audit of Save
newsItems.description: Through support from the Open Tech Fund's (OTF) Red Team Lab, OpenArchive successfully completed a third-party security audit conducted by Trail of Bits.
